name: Lizargon Beta 0.3.0
description:
Lizargon is (going to be) a 2d-platformer with a focus on speed, momentum, and agility. This third beta shows off all of Lizargon's movement mechanics that will be in the final game, along with the general idea I have for the areas and progression for what I want in the final game.

This is the last beta I will put this much effort into, besides the pre-release betas. There will still be more Lizargon betas, but they will most likely be a couple of scenes to experiment with the mechanics added without the main menu. This is because making levels that will not even be in the final game takes a pretty long time, and in the end, they go to waste since Lizargon is still under development.

Next up for Lizargon:

-Tweaks to the movement mechanics (especially the new elemental abilities)

-Tweaks to how the movement mechanics are programmed to fix bugs

-Slopes to make the level design more organic and less annoying to traverse

-The fun part: Lizargon's combat mechanics
